messages.subject: The Autodidact Symposium-- Reminder
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings fellow unschoolers! There are only six weeks left until the weekend of The Autodidact Symposium, and it s not too late to register! Remember, at the
messages.messageBody:
Greetings fellow unschoolers!

There are only six weeks left until the weekend of The Autodidact Symposium, and it's not too late to register! Remember, at the end of February the price jumps, so get your info in soon! Beautifully hand-drawn t-shirts are also available!

The Symposium offers mentorship, inspiration, and support to passionate young people while also informing novice unschoolers about the movement and bringing like-minded families and friends together for a weekend of fun, excitement, friendship, learning, and growth. For ALL the information regarding the Symposium, visit our website!

http://theautodidactsymposium.com

Thank you, and I hope to see you there!

-Cameron Lovejoy
Director, The Autodidact Symposium - March 12-14, 2010 Columbia, SC
http://theautodidactsymposium.com
